page.title: 16HIGHBRIDGE MARKET
page.content:
HIGHBRIDGE MARKET
The market at Highbridge covers an area of about an acre.The market hasbeen in existance for about 100 years.Part of the site was previously the old docks,but it has been filled in to provide more parking for the cattle trucks. Each week,on a Monday,they auction about Â£250000 worth of cattle,sheep & pigs.400-500 cattle are sold weekly,at prices from Â£1.50 to Â£1300! The auctioneer,Mr.Palmer has been there for 45 years.People come from as far as 60 miles away for the sales.
